title: Looking to join a clan :)
body:
Hey Everyone,

I am looking to join a fun friendly club.

I have had an account since season 2 but haven’t actively played in about a year.

I would prefer a club that uses VOIP as its easier to communicate. (I have skype, TS, and Raidcall but I can install others)

IGN: **Ayumura**

Thank you!

replies.body: I hear Satan's Money Crew is back on the streets. Friendly guys, regularly queue together, use skype and TS. Oh, and weekly cross burnings and drive-by shootings.
